lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson made a "horrific" start to the second round of the PGA Championship on Friday but recovered to make the cut with nothing to spare, while Rory McIlroy's bogey at the last saw him miss out by one stroke.

headline.print_headline: Mickelson Makes Cut Despite Horror Start, McIlroy Misses It
headline.main: Mickelson Makes Cut Despite Horror Start, McIlroy Misses It

snippet: Phil Mickelson made a "horrific" start to the second round of the PGA Championship on Friday but recovered to make the cut with nothing to spare, while Rory McIlroy's bogey at the last saw him miss out by one stroke....
